é¦–å…ˆï¼Œ åœ°ä½å ªæ¯”å±±ä¸œè“ç¿”çš„å‰ç«¯ç½‘æ ¡ W3school åœ¨ä»‹ç» rowspan æ—¶ç»™å‡ºäº†è¿™æ ·ä¸€å¥æœ‰ç”¨çš„æ³¨é‡Šï¼š

Note:Â rowspan=â€0â€ tells the browser to span the cell to the last row of the table section (thead, tbody, or tfoot)

å†å»çœ‹çœ‹ W3C çš„è§£é‡Šï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿæ›´æƒå¨ã€‚ä¸Šé¢çš„æ–‡æ¡£è¿™æ ·è¯´é“ï¼š

This attribute specifies the number of rows spanned by the current cell. The default value of this attribute is one (â€œ1â€). The value zero (â€œ0â€) means that the cell spans all rows from the current row to the last row of the table section (THEAD,Â TBODY, orÂ TFOOT) in which the cell is defined.
